t: Huffy - Overview, News & Similar companies | ZoomInfo.com
s: DAYTON, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)--United Wheels (UW), the parent company of bicycle brands Huffy, Niner, Batch, and Buzz Bicycles, today announced that Bruno Maier has been appointed President and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of United Wheels and the Huffy Corporation with immediate effect.

t: Huffy Corporation - Company Profile, Information, Business Description, History, Background Information on Huffy Corporation
s: Until then, half of Huffman's bicycles were sold under private labels. By the end of the 1970s, however, the company decided to devote more energy to promoting its own brand name. Part of this effort included the decision, in 1977, to change the company name to Huffy Corporation.

t: A 125-year history: Huffy Corp. rolls through the changes as bike market shifts - Dayton Business Journal
s: October 20, 2017 - Additionally, the bike maker created ... on Amazon.com. "As the marketplace changes, our company has to adapt," Smith said. Adapting to market changes is nothing new to Huffy. When the company was founded in 1892, it was a sewing machine business. Throughout the years, it has sold service station equipment, lawn mowers, skateboards, scooters and more. For Smith, Huffy's ability to "roll through the changes" is what has made the brand a success ...
